short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks out of the level up popup in clozemaster and focuses on the text input

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instead of having to manually click out of the level up popup and the reselect the text field, this extension will automatically do it for you. You'll briefly see the popup whenever you level up, but it will no longer be as disruptive to your experience.
